code: import axios from'axios';import{GET_STOCKS,ADD_STOCKS,DELETE_STOCK,LOADING}from'./types';export var getStocks=function getStocks(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setLoading());axios.get('/api/stocks').then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_STOCKS,payload:res.data});});};};export var deleteStock=function deleteStock(id){return function(dispatch){axios.delete("/api/stocks/".concat(id)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_STOCK,payload:id});});};};export var addStocks=function addStocks(stock){return function(dispatch){axios.post('/api/stocks',stock).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_STOCKS,payload:res.data});});};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(){return{type:LOADING};};
